Dependency Information

Apache Maven

<dependency>
  <groupId>io.dropwizard</groupId>
  <artifactId>dropwizard-validation</artifactId>
  <version>1.0.0</version>
</dependency>

Apache Buildr

'io.dropwizard:dropwizard-validation:jar:1.0.0'

Apache Ivy

<dependency org="io.dropwizard" name="dropwizard-validation" rev="1.0.0">
  <artifact name="dropwizard-validation" type="jar" />
</dependency>

Groovy Grape

@Grapes(
@Grab(group='io.dropwizard', module='dropwizard-validation', version='1.0.0')
)

Grails

compile 'io.dropwizard:dropwizard-validation:1.0.0'

Leiningen

[io.dropwizard/dropwizard-validation "1.0.0"]

SBT

libraryDependencies += "io.dropwizard" % "dropwizard-validation" % "1.0.0"
